abstract: The order was part of an environmental partnership with Boeing that includes joint research into biofuels for use in jet engines.
snippet: The order was part of an environmental partnership with Boeing that includes joint research into biofuels for use in jet engines.
lead_paragraph: PARIS, April 24 — Virgin Atlantic Airways ordered 15 fuel-efficient Boeing 787 planes Tuesday as part of an environmental partnership with the company that includes joint research into biofuels for use in jet engines.

headline.main: Virgin Orders 15 Boeing Jets to Save Fuel and Cut Noise
headline.print_headline: Virgin Orders 15 Boeing Jets To Save Fuel And Cut Noise
